posts.content:
I have 2 Woolrich Parkas for sale people both are in dark green colour and both are brand new with all tags still attached but please note they are Without the Fur. i don't have the furs I'm sorry test they should have furs and the zip is in place but the fur is missing hence the bargain price of 200 each posted. thats 389 pound cheaper than in the shop each so a real bargain if you don't mind not having the fur.

here is a link to the exact parka if interested and i will send you pictures if them if interested.

http://uk.woolrich.eu/on/demandware.sto ... 674CN01RSG

sizes available are 1 x EXTRA LARGE and 1 x MEDIUM

just to clarify they are 100% original i don't do fake

cheers

Forgot to mention if you are local to the city of london you are more than welcome to come and try before you buy
